attributes.action: Allow All KS4 Students Off Their School Sight At Lunchtime
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I was looking forward to KS4 at my school because it meant i was able to leave the school sight at lunchtime and then our headteacher turned around and basically said No to us without even giving us a chance and it was all because of the Yr above me being stupid. I want to give younger years the opportunity that i never had.
